questions.text: Who morphed into a rhino in "The Warning"?
questions.explanation:
Jake.

	"The Warning" is about finding and shutting down the company Web Access of America.

Rachel.

	Rachel morphed into a crocodile in "The Reaction".

questions.text: Who stayed too long in a morph and became trapped as it?
questions.explanation:
Tobias.

	Tobias regained the ability to morph in book #13, "The Change".

questions.text: Cassie morphs into a butterfly in the book "The Departure."
questions.explanation:
False.

	Cassie agreed to get trapped in a CATERPILLAR morph on the condition that Aftran, a yeerk, would free her host, Karen. Cassie changes from caterpillar to butterfly later on (natural morphing) which resets the two-hour clock and is hence able to demorph.
